Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory4.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Clean-up complete!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The last Corrupted stops moving under his chain blade. Roland spins his shotgun and looks out into the distance.'}
{3: 'His comms rings.'}
{2: 'Message from Cinderelik', 3: '"Target lured to the designated location."'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Looks like those little pets Cinderelik brought have led the Scavengers right to me...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Very good. I always take every performance seriously.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Let the show begin.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Recording:', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The ability of Hetero-Creatures to imitate fighting skills is incredible. Their regeneration speed has also reached the expected standard.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'The Punishing Red Tide is spreading on the surface and capturing food as planned. Everything is developing steadily.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "â€”The Punishing Virus's own will is growing in this deep pool.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'After witnessing the generation and extinction of innumerable Hetero-Creatures, this thought spontaneously crossed my neural circuit.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'It seems I can advance to the next step in my plan.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Before that, I need to "create" powerful tools. A powerful force needs a terminal that can control it.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Roland showed interest in Hetero-Creatures. After testing his loyalty, I have acquiesced to him participating in the experiment under my supervision.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}

{1: 'However, he doesn\'t seem to have understood anything regarding the experiments. Instead, he seems more concerned with the "nature of Ascnet".', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "Fool, that isn't of our concern. Our mission is to pass on the will of Ascnet.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: "Surely enough, I can't expect him to understand the ambitions of Ascnet.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: '...', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory449.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
